author: Constant Méheut
title: In a Call with Putin, Macron Pursues a Diplomatic Solution in Ukraine - The New York Times
description: But the Kremlin signaled little optimism regarding a diplomatic path, saying Western countries were pushing Ukraine’s government to a “military solution.”
content: The goal of this meeting, expected to be held Monday, is to obtain a commitment from all the parties involved to a cease-fire on the front line in eastern Ukraine between Russian-backed separatists a… [+1894 chars]
